file_content.text: Greetings, master. You're looking fit and deadly, as always.
Have I mentioned recently how much I enjoy serving you? I am a lucky droid, master.
Always a pleasure, master. I hope you're having an excellent day and feel no desire to deactivate me.
Seeing you return to this ship always warms my circuits, master. It reminds me I am still functioning.
Greetings, master. I cleaned the vessel from stem to stern in your absence. You can smell the difference!
Hail to the Emperor! More importantly, hail to you, master!
Welcome back, master. I've just completed a new meal plan for your culinary pleasure.
Do you require anything, master? A hot meal, perhaps? Conversation? Foot massage? Just say the word.
The galaxy will continue trembling at your approach if it knows what's good for it, master. Maker knows, I do.
I've just finished cleaning the fuel injectors to the sublight drive. You should notice a point oh-oh-oh-oh-eight percent power increase.
Good to see you, master. I applied a fresh coat of paint to your quarters. Same color, of course--only fresher!
I am truly honored to serve such a personage as you, master. History will remember your name. Not mine, but definitely yours.
Oh! Ah, I mean... greetings! I am Toovee Arrate, factotum droid for this vessel. You must be my new master. Gentle, kind new master....
Do I seem gentle to you? Tell me your attack protocols, droid.
List your combat functions.
I was not constructed for violence, master--but I am still useful.
What are you, my personal entertainer? Do you perform tricks?
You're an odd little thing.
Not as such, master. I would be willing to learn tricks if it pleases you, however.
Your last master isn't coming back. Got a problem with that?
Your old master is dead.
Absolutely not. He called me unpleasant names and never bathed. Not that there is anything wrong with that, master....
A gift from my superior? Here to keep an eye on me, I presume.
Keeper must have sent you.
My only directive is your satisfaction, master. Besides, my photoreceptors are not surveillance-grade.
Let's not get ahead of ourselves. What's your function aboard my ship?
Depends. What's a "factotum"?
So I get a starship and a servant, too? Not bad at all.
My own droid? Excellent.
I am relieved--er, pleased--that you find me agreeable. I will never disappoint you, master.
I am programmed for a wide array of tasks, including but not limited to meal preparation, ship maintenance, janitorial duty and etiquette.
Welcome aboard this Fury-class Imperial Interceptor, a versatile craft combining a starfighter's maneuverability with armament to rival larger military vessels.
Welcome aboard this Kuat Drive Yards D5-Mantis Patrol Craft. Its speed and firepower are unmatched by other vessels of its class.
Welcome aboard the X-70B Phantom: an experimental prototype resembling a luxury shuttle that conceals the combat capabilities of a heavy starfighter.
You'll find all of the standard amenities, including your own private captain's locker for storing valuables.
A state-of-the-art enhancement station is available should you wish to upgrade your equipment.
The astrogation console contains a constantly updated map of the known galaxy.
Interstellar communications are accessed via the ship's holoterminal.
Priority alerts that you may find useful are available from the Imperial HoloNet console.
Lastly, the ship's intercom will inform your crew that you wish to issue new orders. Any questions, master?
Are you at least capable of providing security while I'm not aboard?
Can you fight at all?
I have a mission to complete. Time to see what this ship can do.
I'm ready for departure.
Thank goodness you aren't deactivating me! I mean... good luck!
Stop selling me the ship and stay out of my way.
You can shut up now.
I promise to limit all future conversation to essential information. Premature deactivation is not one of my directives.
I regret I am unable to offer you combat support, master. Frankly, my chassis couldn't withstand the stress.
However, should any errands arise that are beneath your superior status, please do not hesitate to call upon me. I function to serve you!
Whenever you are ready to depart, consult the galaxy map on your bridge. It will program the proper astrogation coordinates and activate the engines.
